PardotSettings.name: PardotSettings
PardotSettings.label: Pardot Settings
PardotSettings.description: Represents PardotSettings metadata component used in Salesforce deployments and package development.

FullName.description: The unique identifier for this metadata component

enableB2bmaAppEnabled.description: enable B2bma App Enabled field of PardotSettings metadata component.

enableEngagementHistoryDashboards.description: enable Engagement History Dashboards field of PardotSettings metadata component.

enablePardotAppV1Enabled.description: enable Pardot App V1 Enabled field of PardotSettings metadata component.

enablePardotEnabled.description: enable Pardot Enabled field of PardotSettings metadata component.

enableProspectActivityDataset.description: enable Prospect Activity Dataset field of PardotSettings metadata component.
